questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dangerous Minds

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Looking Out my Backdoor

questions.question: This 1999 movie, based on a best selling novel by Jacquelyn Mitchard, stars Michelle Pfeiffer as a mother whose youngest son is kidnapped by a mentally ill woman who raises him as her own for 9 years, until he happens to show up on his real familys door step, asking if they need their lawn mowed.

options.text: The Deep End of the Ocean

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Deep End of the Ocean

questions.question: In this movie, Sean Penn stars as a mentally challenged adult who is single-handedly raising his daughter until questions arise about his ability to care for the girl and a custody case is brought to the court. Michelle Pfeiffer plays the lawyer who works with him to help him keep custody of his little girl.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I Am Sam

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wolf

questions.question: Michelle Pfeiffer stars with Robert Redford in this 1996 drama/romance, inspired by the story of Jessica Savitch who, in the 1970s became the first female anchor on American television.

options.text: The Deep End of the Ocean

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Up Close and Personal

questions.question: In this 1988 comedy, Michelle Pfeiffer plays Angela deMarco who tries to leave the criminal lifestyle after her gangster husband Frank, played by Alec Baldwin is murdered.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Married to the Mob

questions.question: This movie stars Michelle Pfeiffer as Claire Spencer, wife of a renowned scientist, played by Harrison Ford. Claire believes she is being haunted and begins to experience paranormal events and in the end solves the murder of a young woman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: What Lies Beneath

questions.question: In this 1992 superhero film, Michelle Pfeiffer plays Selina Kyle, a timid secretary, who discovers her bosss evil plan to suck power from the city.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman Returns

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scarface

questions.question: In this 2002 dramatic film Michelle Pfeiffer plays Ingrid Magnussen, a free-spirited mother who falls in love and then murders the man that broke her heart, receiving a life sentence in prison and throwing her 15-year-old daughter into foster care.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White Oleander

questions.question: Michelle Pfeiffer had her first major screen role in this 1980 film also starring Tony Danza.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hollywood Knights

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paula Prentiss

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ann Archer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dermot Mulroney

But he is perhaps best known as a NYC police detective who never fired his gun in over 30 years on the job. Who is this actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jerry Orbach

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Uncle Tonoose

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary Frann

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cloris Leachman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was born Amos Muzyad Jahoob in Deerfield, Michigan.
